## utils.isCryptoKeyPair() function

Type guard function to check if the given key is a Web5Crypto.CryptoKeyPair.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isCryptoKeyPair(key: Web5Crypto.CryptoKey | Web5Crypto.CryptoKeyPair): key is Web5Crypto.CryptoKeyPair;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [Web5Crypto.CryptoKey](./crypto.web5crypto.cryptokey.md) \| [Web5Crypto.CryptoKeyPair](./crypto.web5crypto.cryptokeypair.md) | The key to check. |

**Returns:**

key is [Web5Crypto.CryptoKeyPair](./crypto.web5crypto.cryptokeypair.md)

True if the key is a CryptoKeyPair, false otherwise.
